nodes.text: The Uvena system was a star system located in the Outer Rim Territories, situated around at least one star. It contained the planet Uvena Prime, homeworld of the Shistavanen sentient species. The Shistavanens colonized or otherwise laid claims to every object in the Uvena system in order to ensure they remained in control, establishing outposts on large asteroids and maintaining their presence with probe droid patrols.
